urgency.text: Emergency and urgent matters require immediate attention. For medical emergencies call 15 (SAMU) or 112. For dental emergencies, same-day slots are available between 11h-12h and 15h-16h. For property emergencies (water leak, electrical failure), call the 24/7 emergency number.

pricing.text: VocalIA offers competitive and transparent pricing. Our voice solutions are significantly more affordable than market alternatives, with savings of up to 60%. Contact sales for detailed pricing tailored to your business needs.

hours.text: Operating hours vary by business type. Most services operate Monday-Friday 9h-18h. Some offer Saturday hours. 24/7 services include emergency hotlines and automated voice assistants. Check specific business hours in the knowledge base.

contact.text: Contact VocalIA: Phone +1 762-422-4223, email contact@vocalia.ma, or website vocalia.ma/contact. For technical support: support@vocalia.ma. Book a demo at vocalia.ma/booking. Response time is typically within 24 business hours.

data_privacy.text: VocalIA is GDPR compliant. We use privacy-first analytics with no cookies. Customer data is encrypted with enterprise-grade security. Voice interactions are processed in real-time with full data isolation. Data requests can be submitted to privacy@vocalia.ma.

refund.text: Refund and return policies vary by merchant. Standard e-commerce offers 30-day returns for unused items in original packaging. Digital services may have different terms. Contact the specific merchant for their return policy details.

booking.text: Appointment booking is available through multiple channels: voice assistant, online calendar, phone call, or messaging. Bookings require name, contact info, preferred date/time, and service type. Confirmation is sent via SMS or email. Cancellations should be made 24h in advance.

delivery.text: Delivery options include standard (3-5 business days, free over 50€), express (1-2 days, 15€), and same-day for select areas. Real-time tracking via SMS link. If absent, packages go to nearest pickup point. Contact logistics for international shipping.

payment.text: Accepted payment methods include Visa, Mastercard, Amex, PayPal, and Apple Pay. Secure payment processing is handled with enterprise-grade encryption. Payment links and invoices are available. Installment plans (3-4x sans frais) offered by some merchants.

language_support.text: VocalIA supports 5 languages: French (FR), English (EN), Spanish (ES), Arabic (AR/MSA), and Moroccan Darija (ARY). Language is auto-detected or can be specified. All personas have full multilingual translations.
